description.en:
ğŸ¤© Excited to announce our second FalconPool Project: Gourmet Galaxy (GUM) ğŸ˜±

Introducing Gourmet Galaxy
Donâ€™t let the name fool you, Gourmet Galaxy isn't just food, it's a whole DeFi Ecosystem inside an NFT Gaming Experience.

Gourmet Galaxy helps you to easily approach DeFi while enjoying a gaming experience. 
The best of all, the whole ecosystem revolves around $GUM tokens!

With Gourmet Galaxy you can:
ğŸ” Swap: Trade with AMM using GUM Swap.
â¹ Liquidity Staking: Farm GUM using digital assets and earn an incredible APY!
ğŸ”‚ Trading: Trade on a decentralized Trading Platform in a gamified experience.
ğŸ›„ Collect NFT's: Collect rare and Unique NFTs and exchange them for big money.

â‡ï¸ GUM Token
GUM is a vital part of Gourmet Galaxy, with a mechanism that is designed to give it value intrinsically tied to the Gourmet Galaxy Platform. GUM use cases include:
1ï¸âƒ£ Governance: Including Staking, System Votes.
2ï¸âƒ£ Content creation: Create your own special planets for sale.
3ï¸âƒ£ Play Mini games related to Trading/Prediction Market.
4ï¸âƒ£ Buy/sell items.
5ï¸âƒ£ Revenue Sharing.
